response.original_title: Masturbating During Therapy: Dr. Suzy's Controversial Phone Sex Therapy Sessions
response.overview: "Meet Dr. Suzy, famed sex therapist and originator of phone sex therapy. Operating out of her co-op/call center ‘Bonoboville,’ Dr. Suzy’s method is rather unconventional—combining therapy with phone sex and charging by each sexy minute. For decades she has helped clients find the roots of their sexual issues, and also find release, as they are freely encouraged to masturbate during their phone sessions. It might seem controversial, but to her, no fantasy is too taboo within the confines of therapy" (Vice).
response.title: Masturbating During Therapy: Dr. Suzy's Controversial Phone Sex Therapy Sessions
